channel.title: My first script Dicearoo
channel.description:
for some reason it only works for a little bit, and then randomly clicks somewhere, can someone help me with this? [code]/////////////////////////////////////////////////// /////////////////////////////////////////////////// /////////This is my First Script/////////////////// /////////Feed Back is Appreciated////////////////// /////////drag crosshair to page//////////////////// //////Have fun and start on main page////////////// /////////////////////////////////////////////////// /////////////////////////////////////////////////// program Dicearoo; var Dicearoo_rollbutton, x, y: integer;
procedure play; begin clickmouse(444,578,true) wait(3000) clickmouse(440,413,true) wait(3000) repeat Dicearoo_rollbutton := BitmapFromString(101, 32, 'z78DAED5A' + '5B72AB300CDD120F3FF0A76D49FB5F5285ED49D3C9852B480A34D' + '1D1CC6986C846426764979848A15028140A8542A1507C18325B22' + '4B23F5345087997A244C9FC06C130EEFC4FFC8B4D694AB8BD8AA5' + 'C2B7E0C9AAE3892C9430811076BFD64BA6ECC5EF9CF73EF0C7874' + '618AD190E13A278A14C81FA4AEA2EAAA2B9615C421779900B4A9B' + 'F07C002F78D5A598F5C653AB4771575D57E9528236442B5373328' + '954DB5CA878ABBACCBB58B12B0E5C6DF9694FF30CF16C9CDAB62A' + 'BF29128BDABDD37DE2C28BF054FBCAF36A58320C693D535B1F9C2' + '6E2B7702EC9B79E95EEB57F6CD733CFF620C9ECDD6FA22604477B' + '2BA5CE9A0DF3CCAB93DA5A77DF6DD6BDFCCAF8AE7A26CD906EAB9' + '6FB5772F1750D77D84839CEF2AF5324FF90C5BE7BCF77F3E9E8BF' + '2ACAEBEA82B1675F51750D7D0345F631373ABD1139E8BEBA96006' + 'F9DD1FFD256397A2FAED5CD6C7FE87E7F75B1D6B8B30B0BE3C17F' + '95C753DC626E6F60476F9AC8F7DFC5672E55531AC5FDF1A893C97' + '67726C3CD2585E4820F7AD80EE7475B121359E63433977622C8D5' + 'D9F79EB15F96CFBAE4B46499E803C17798E8D071A78373FEFE81D' + 'EBCB029EACAE87D8E4DC72DFE5B93E56E22FB9FB06FDBF34B657E' + '5227FC28D79CF8599B595D1F2BA68004E56D71C15369E630339B7' + 'DC7779AE8F95F84BEEBECFE7F9D85E958BFC09379EF75C992DB1B' + 'A1C8E9750D70FE5CBF92EF7CD9EEB6325FE5B679047B834F647AF' + '3B2497AD591475A5A22E53D4954F56D7436C726EB93FE1BFB84E8' + '9C71E19DBFACCEBB9ACCF20CF7A9DCB8E3EF0DF882377AF01D2C9' + 'EAFA8E2D2A4BF8AEE2978BADFDB718E7375DDCBD0608E7AAAB745' + '157DEECDAC6F9C64EF991ABBA2E175BAD5DB8E92A620700E60475' + 'CD27CAA89E314B947D8E1C0D81E378100CF6CCB65DF9605E5AE92' + 'E1A73A91A7FCAC0EB21F80CC925FE50AB7CA8BACA2F9D6E9A4234' + '26FA3E8C718C980C38E8B255FE936C990DD84C794C7DF2C999C96' + '1E85C9E20BA43D555CFFF049A689CBA9053A7279FDFF0E4F3BC01' + 'F3E54C8ED5F3BA0A8542A15028140A8542A1F80D7C0140D74E97'); if(findbitmap(Dicearoo_rollbutton, x, y))then clickmouse(x+40,y+15,true) wait(3000) until(false) wait(3000) clickmouse(491,549,true) wait(3000) end; begin play; end.[/code] Thank you

item.title: My first script Dicearoo
item.dc:creator: @13om13e12 13om13e12
item.description:
@13om13e12 wrote:

for some reason it only works for a little bit, and then randomly clicks somewhere, can someone help me with this?

[code]///////////////////////////////////////////////////
///////////////////////////////////////////////////
/////////This is my First Script///////////////////
/////////Feed Back is Appreciated//////////////////
/////////drag crosshair to page////////////////////
//////Have fun and start on main page//////////////
///////////////////////////////////////////////////
///////////////////////////////////////////////////
program Dicearoo;
var Dicearoo_rollbutton, x, y: integer;

procedure play;
begin
clickmouse(444,578,true)
wait(3000)
clickmouse(440,413,true)
wait(3000)
repeat
Dicearoo_rollbutton := BitmapFromString(101, 32, ‘z78DAED5A’ +
‘5B72AB300CDD120F3FF0A76D49FB5F5285ED49D3C9852B480A34D’ +
‘1D1CC6986C846426764979848A15028140A8542A1507C18325B22’ +
‘4B23F5345087997A244C9FC06C130EEFC4FFC8B4D694AB8BD8AA5’ +
‘C2B7E0C9AAE3892C9430811076BFD64BA6ECC5EF9CF73EF0C7874’ +
‘618AD190E13A278A14C81FA4AEA2EAAA2B9615C421779900B4A9B’ +
‘F07C002F78D5A598F5C653AB4771575D57E9528236442B5373328’ +
‘954DB5CA878ABBACCBB58B12B0E5C6DF9694FF30CF16C9CDAB62A’ +
‘BF29128BDABDD37DE2C28BF054FBCAF36A58320C693D535B1F9C2’ +
‘6E2B7702EC9B79E95EEB57F6CD733CFF620C9ECDD6FA22604477B’ +
‘2BA5CE9A0DF3CCAB93DA5A77DF6DD6BDFCCAF8AE7A26CD906EAB9’ +
‘6FB5772F1750D77D84839CEF2AF5324FF90C5BE7BCF77F3E9E8BF’ +
‘2ACAEBEA82B1675F51750D7D0345F631373ABD1139E8BEBA96006’ +
‘F9DD1FFD256397A2FAED5CD6C7FE87E7F75B1D6B8B30B0BE3C17F’ +
‘95C753DC626E6F60476F9AC8F7DFC5672E55531AC5FDF1A893C97’ +
‘67726C3CD2585E4820F7AD80EE7475B121359E63433977622C8D5’ +
‘D9F79EB15F96CFBAE4B46499E803C17798E8D071A78373FEFE81D’ +
‘EBCB029EACAE87D8E4DC72DFE5B93E56E22FB9FB06FDBF34B657E’ +
‘5227FC28D79CF8599B595D1F2BA68004E56D71C15369E630339B7’ +
‘DC7779AE8F95F84BEEBECFE7F9D85E958BFC09379EF75C992DB1B’ +
‘A1C8E9750D70FE5CBF92EF7CD9EEB6325FE5B679047B834F647AF’ +
‘3B2497AD591475A5A22E53D4954F56D7436C726EB93FE1BFB84E8’ +
‘9C71E19DBFACCEBB9ACCF20CF7A9DCB8E3EF0DF882377AF01D2C9’ +
‘EAFA8E2D2A4BF8AEE2978BADFDB718E7375DDCBD0608E7AAAB745’ +
‘157DEECDAC6F9C64EF991ABBA2E175BAD5DB8E92A620700E60475’ +
‘CD27CAA89E314B947D8E1C0D81E378100CF6CCB65DF9605E5AE92’ +
‘E1A73A91A7FCAC0EB21F80CC925FE50AB7CA8BACA2F9D6E9A4234’ +
‘26FA3E8C718C980C38E8B255FE936C990DD84C794C7DF2C999C96’ +
‘1E85C9E20BA43D555CFFF049A689CBA9053A7279FDFF0E4F3BC01’ +
‘F3E54C8ED5F3BA0A8542A15028140A8542A1F80D7C0140D74E97’);
if(findbitmap(Dicearoo_rollbutton, x, y))then
clickmouse(x+40,y+15,true)
wait(3000)
until(false)
wait(3000)
clickmouse(491,549,true)
wait(3000)
end;
begin
play;
end.[/code]
Thank you
